As an AI language model, I do not have access to real-time information, and my knowledge is based on the latest available data. However, according to reports, there are ongoing efforts to improve public transportation in Longford. These efforts include the development of a Bus Rapid Transit (BRT) system, which could provide a fast, reliable, and efficient transport option in and around the town.

Longford County Council has also collaborated with the National Transport Authority (NTA) to develop a Sustainable Transport Study to identify potential transport improvements in the county, including public transportation. The study aims to help Longford address issues such as congestion, climate change, and air quality by providing sustainable and integrated transport options.

Overall, the implementation of these public transportation improvement plans is expected to provide more convenient and cost-effective transport options for residents, reduce traffic congestion in the town, and contribute to the overall development objectives of Longford.
